item.title: 杰富瑞的前海豹突击队在不良债务投资中获得优势
item.description: 在杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：At Jefferies Financial Group Inc., a small group of traders and analysts run by a former Navy SEAL is having an outsized impact in the crowded and contentious world of distressed debt.】

item.title: 埃及和巴基斯坦等待新兴市场降级威胁的裁决
item.description: 失去新兴市场地位的威胁笼罩着埃及和巴基斯坦，这两个国家将在周三了解其经济扭转计划是否足以避免在富时罗素（FTSE Russell）被降级。越南正在等待难以实现的晋升。【原文：The threat of losing their emerging-market status hangs over Egypt and Pakistan, which will learn on Wednesday whether their economic-turnaround plans are enough to avoid demotion at FTSE Russell. Vietnam is awaiting an elusive promotion.】

item.title: 乌克兰试图向天然气贸易商保证其储气库的安全
item.description: 乌克兰正试图向欧洲天然气贸易商保证，在遭到俄罗斯袭击后，在该国庞大的地下设施中储存天然气燃料仍然是安全的。【原文：Ukraine is seeking to reassure European natural gas traders that it’s still safe to store the fuel in the country’s vast underground facilities after a Russian attack.】

item.title: 伦敦保险公司面临巴尔的摩大桥价值数十亿美元的赔款
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）分析师表示，周二巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥倒塌后，保险公司面临高达 30 亿美元的索赔，其中伦敦劳合社市场上的公司面临的风险最大。【原文：Insurers face claims of as much as $3 billion following Tuesday’s collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore, with firms on the Lloyd’s of London market most exposed, Barclays Plc analysts said.】

item.title: 印度将在大选前出售更少债券，指数将被纳入
item.description: 随着决策者在大选前控制支出并将国家债务纳入全球指数，印度出售的债券数量将少于预期。【原文：India will sell fewer bonds than estimated as policymakers rein in spending ahead of elections and inclusion of the nation’s debt in global indexes.】

item.title: 拜登推动生物燃料有可能取代玉米成为美国作物之王
item.description: 2024 年，美国农民种植的玉米将超过大豆；一个多世纪以来，大多数年份都是如此。但除此之外，绿色柴油的蓬勃发展有可能会取代作物之王的地位。【原文：American farmers will plant more corn than soybeans in 2024 — as they have in most years for over a century. But beyond that, a green diesel boom threatens to dethrone the king of all crops.】

item.title: 耶伦警告中国产业升级正在扭曲世界经济
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，她计划在即将对中国进行的访问中，就中国工业产能过剩扭曲全球经济的问题向中国施压。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said she plans to press China in an upcoming visit to the country on a ramp-up in its industrial capacity that’s distorting the global economy.】

item.title: 可可波动，投资者在涨至 10,000 美元后获利了结
item.description: 可可期货在纽约出现波动，因为投资者在价格突破每吨 10,000 美元的涨势一天后平仓。【原文：Cocoa futures fluctuated in New York as investors closed positions a day after a rally that took prices above $10,000 a ton.】

item.title: Ardian 投资的连锁实验室 Inovie 考虑出售 30 亿欧元资产
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由收购公司 Ardian SAS 支持的法国连锁实验室 Inovie 集团正在考虑一项可能的出售计划，该计划可能使该公司的业务价值超过 30 亿欧元（32 亿美元）。【原文：Inovie Group, the French laboratories chain backed by buyout firm Ardian SAS, is considering a potential sale that could value the business at more than €3 billion ($3.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国对东南亚的金砖倡议资金缺口超过 500 亿美元
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，中国在东南亚的基础设施支出承诺仅兑现了三分之一多一点，缺口超过 500 亿美元。【原文：China’s been able to deliver on only a little over a third of its infrastructure spending commitments in Southeast Asia, leaving a shortfall of more than $50 billion, according to a new report.】

item.title: 中国煤炭贸易描绘出一幅黯淡的经济图景
item.description:
电力消费通常在假期结束后的三月份回升，但贸易商却很难找到现货货物。【原文：

Power consumption usually picks up in March after the holiday lull, yet traders are struggling to place spot cargoes.

】

item.title: 习近平在荷兰总理访问期间抨击 "技术壁垒
item.description: 在荷兰首相马克-吕特（Mark Rutte）访问北京期间，中国国家主席习近平批评了 "技术壁垒"，因为美国正在推动加强对 ASML Holding NV 向亚洲国家销售芯片制造设备的控制。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping criticized “technological barriers” during Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte’s visit to Beijing as the US pushes to tighten controls on ASML Holding NV’s chipmaking-equipment sales to the Asian country.】

item.title: Altimmune 肥胖症药物在试验中减少了脂肪，但肌肉损失较少
item.description: Altimmune 公司的实验性减肥药在一项中期试验中最大限度地减少了肌肉的衰退，这表明它可以解决肥胖症制药商一直在竞相解决的问题。【原文：Altimmune Inc.’s experimental weight-loss drug minimized muscle decline in a mid-stage trial, a sign that it can address a problem obesity drugmakers have been racing to solve.】

item.title: 新兴市场因美国通胀和人民币政策而谨慎回落
item.description: 由于美联储降息步伐和中国货币管理的不确定性，新兴市场股票和货币下跌。【原文：Emerging market stocks and currencies fell on uncertainty over the pace of Federal Reserve rate cuts and China’s currency management.】

item.title: 市场条件有利于资产剥离，意大利加紧出售 Paschi
item.description: 由于缺乏竞争对手的兴趣，合并的可能性较小，意大利正在采取行动，以满足欧盟提出的处理 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 的要求，利用有利的市场条件和该银行在扭亏为盈方面取得的进展。【原文：Italy is making moves to comply with European Union demands to dispose of Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA, leveraging off favorable market conditions and the bank’s progress in turning itself around, as lack of interests from rivals makes a merger less likely.】

item.title: 资深中国投资者呼吁全面取消房地产抑制政策
item.description: 亚洲最著名的私募股权投资者之一提议在中国全面取消购房限制，认为中国远未出现住宅严重供过于求的局面。【原文：One of Asia’s best-known private equity investors is proposing a complete removal of home-buying restrictions in China, arguing the country is far from facing a severe oversupply in residential housing.】

item.title: 中国人寿称利润下降，市场疲软损害投资
item.description: 中国最大的人寿保险公司中国人寿保险股份有限公司表示，由于股市暴跌和债券收益率下降损害了投资回报，去年利润下降了 31%。【原文：China Life Insurance Co., the nation’s largest life insurer, said profit fell 31% last year as a stock market rout and lower bond yields hurt investment returns.】

item.title: 大型石油公司收回承诺，中国石油提升绿色雄心
item.description: 中国最大的石油公司刚刚从原油钻探和天然气开采中获得创纪录的利润，就承诺到 2033 年其所有产出都将由可再生能源提供燃料。【原文：Fresh from posting record profits from drilling crude and pumping gas, China’s biggest oil company has promised that all of its output will be fueled by renewable power come 2033.】

item.title: 价值 330 亿美元的项目表明日本真的想造飞机
item.description: 日本贸易部希望重振该国的航空雄心。【原文：Japan’s trade ministry wants to get the country’s aviation ambitions back up in the air.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。日元对美元汇率触及 1990 年以来的最低水平，助长了干预押注，而库存积压则对石油构成压力。以下是今天市场关注的焦点。【原文：Good morning. The yen touched its lowest level versus the dollar since 1990, fueling intervention bets, while inventory stockpiling weighs on oil. Here’s what markets are watching today. — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 英国央行对银行的调查显示对地缘政治的担忧创下新高
item.description: 据英格兰银行称，英国银行和其他金融公司对地缘政治风险的担忧达到了历史最高水平。【原文：UK banks and other financial firms’ worries about geopolitical risk are at their highest level on record, according to the Bank of England.】

item.title: Gamestop 收入骤降，将创九个月来最大跌幅
item.description: 视频游戏零售商 Gamestop Corp. 的股价有望创下九个月来的最大跌幅，因为这只最初的 "备忘录股 "之一报告称第四季度收入大幅下滑。【原文：Shares in video game retailer Gamestop Corp. were on track for the biggest decline in nine months after one of the original meme stocks reported revenue plunged in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 英国央行首席经济学家称最低工资上涨可能引发通货膨胀
item.description: 一个著名商业团体的负责人表示，比以往任何时候都有更多的公司对英国提高最低工资的后果感到担忧。【原文：More companies than ever are worried about the consequences of Britain’s rising minimum wage, according to the head of a prominent business group.】

item.title: 迈克尔-鲁宾是如何掌握所有牌的
item.description:
被劫持的合同。破坏公开募股。这位以汉普顿白色派对而闻名的 Fanatics 首席执行官已成为他这一代人中最令人畏惧的交易者。【原文：

Hijacked contracts. Scuttled public offerings. Stealth acquisitions. The Fanatics CEO famous for his Hamptons white parties has become the most feared dealmaker of his generation.

item.title: 银行大规模举债带来一系列危险
item.description:
覆盖债券一直是贷款人在偿还巨额 Covid 贷款时最喜欢的一种获得资金的方式。但该市场可能已接近饱和。【原文：

Covered bonds have been a favorite way for lenders to get money as they repay giant Covid loans. But the market may be nearing saturation.

】

item.title: 英伟达使新兴市场选股公司跃居首位并激怒竞争对手
item.description: 刘易斯-考夫曼（Lewis Kaufman）是个骗子还是天才，这要看你问谁了。【原文：Lewis Kaufman is, depending on who you ask, a phony or a genius.】

item.title: 三家人工智能加密货币公司据说即将达成合并代币的交易
item.description: 三家在区块链上运营的人工智能公司正在商谈合并它们的加密代币，此举旨在帮助它们开发一个去中心化的人工智能平台。【原文：Three artificial intelligence companies that operate on blockchain are in talks to merge their crypto tokens, a move aimed at helping them develop a decentralized AI platform.】

item.title: 梅塔称限制共享人工智能技术可能会削弱美国的影响力
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司政策主管尼克-克莱格（Nick Clegg）警告美国政府官员说，限制企业公开分享某些人工智能技术可能会损害美国对相对较新且不断发展的全球人工智能产业的影响力。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. policy chief Nick Clegg warned US government officials that limiting companies from sharing certain artificial intelligence technologies publicly could harm American influence over the relatively new and evolving global AI industry.】

item.title: Point72 风险投资公司的最新赌注是区块链上的车辆所有权
item.description: 史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 风险投资公司（Point72 Ventures）是一群投资者中的一员，他们打赌区块链技术可以在美国用于简化车辆登记。【原文：Steve Cohen’s Point72 Ventures is part of a group of investors betting that blockchain technology can be used in the US to simplify vehicle registration.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 汇回俄罗斯现金的计划通过第一道关卡
item.description: 本周三，随着被制裁的寡头奥列格-德里帕斯卡（Oleg Deripaska）所拥有的一家奥地利建筑公司股份的转让，一连串复杂的交易中的第一部分--将滞留在俄罗斯的莱法森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）资本汇回国内的交易开始了。【原文：The first part of a complex sequence of deals to repatriate Raiffeisen Bank International AG capital stranded in Russia began on Wednesday, with the transfer of shares in an Austrian construction company owned by sanctioned oligarch Oleg Deripaska.】
